findings.lung_bases: dependent atelectasis, no pleural or pericardial effusion
findings.cardiac_silhouette: enlarged, dilatation of the left atrium
findings.liver: 4-mm hypoattenuating lesion within the high right hepatic lobe, otherwise normal
findings.kidneys: multiple hypoattenuating lesions, largest left measuring 3.3 x 3.2 cm (simple cyst), largest right measuring 11 x 8 mm
findings.right_kidney: well-defined hypoattenuated focus involving the interpolar portion, duplication of right-sided collecting system

pelvis.bowel: marked eccentric wall thickening involving mid sigmoid colon with inflammatory changes in adjacent mesenteric fat

findings.bone: mild degenerative changes noted within the lower lumbar spine, disk space narrowing at L2-L3
